about_the_game:
Landed on an unknown planet, you must learn how to survive in this new world. Enjoy a peaceful life on the surface or venture deep into the mines to fight monsters for rare resources and unique equipment.

As time passes, life seems to get better, but you can sense something unusual about this place, all the abandoned ships, buildings and enemies. What happened to the people who used to live here? Can you uncover the secrets behind the ruins?

Features


  • Explore a boundless, procedurally generated world with one overground map and more than 10 underground maps.
  • You can break almost every block in the game and shape the terrain as you wish. Build houses, castles, skyscrapers, and make a river and a waterfall in front of your home. Nothing is impossible.
  • Combine different materials to craft new tools and weapons.
  • Defeat monsters and have a chance to keep them as a pet.
  • Play with friends in both local and online multiplayer.
  • Set up your own dedicated server on your PC, Mac or Linux machines.

short_description: Infinilands is a pixel art sandbox survival game that lets you explore and modify a procedurally generated world full of unique plants, creatures and ruins. You can build houses and fight monsters with your friends in online/split-screen co-op. This game also supports dedicated server.
